What is the main advantage of the Gigabo: Enhancing binding affinity through avidity effects
Increasing the number of epitopes displayed
Reducing the size of the nanoparticle for better penetration
Improving the thermostability of the nanobody
What is the primary function of the ADDo: To display 60 copies of an epitope derived from the SARS-CoV-2 RBM
To deliver mRNA encoding the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein
To provide a live attenuated virus for immune system training
To use a viral vector to express the SARS-CoV-2 nucleocapsid protein
